trustfund:
TF038650-ZAMBIA:  MINE TOWNSHIP SERVICES PROJECT,TF025657-PHRD-URBAN DEVELOPMENT PROJECT,TF039651-ZAMBIA - MINING TOWNSHIP
            SERVICES PROJECT,TF039345-ZAMBIA - MINING TOWNSHIP
            SERVICES - WATER AND SANITATION EXPERT,TF038089-ZAMBIA - MINING TOWNSHIP SERVICES,TF037932-ZAMBIA - MINING MUNICIPAL

abstracts.cdata!:
The Mine Township Services Project is
            intended to facilitate the completion of the privatization
            of ZCCM (Zambia Consolidate Copper Mines) by supporting the
            provision of efficient and reliable water supply services,
            wastewater services and solid waste management in five mine
            townships during a transitional period following the
            privatization. There are three project components. The first
            and second components will be implemented through the AHC
            Mining Municipal Services (AHC-MMS) and the third component
            through the Ministry of Local Government and Housing. The
            first component consists of a) Performance Based Management
            Contract, which will be managed between the AHC-MMS and the
            private operator; b) Production Costs Support and Start-up
            Costs, the monies to finance the AHC-MMS's operation
            and maintenance support which include computer equipment for
            finance and engineering activities; and c) Rehabilitation
            Works, which include rehabilitation of water mains and water
            and wastewater treatment plants. The second component will
            provide support to employees of AHC-MMS and their families,
            and increase the awareness of HIV/AIDS throughout the
            community. The third component will support the preparation
            of a permanent system for the delivery of urban development
            in the selected Copperbelt towns and cities by acting as
            demonstration project for the use of private sector
            contracting to achieve sustainable results.
